item.title: concurrency & garbage w/ node
item.description: This meme reminds me a lot of Node as well. In this article, I’ll attempt to bring more clarity about how Node works under the hood from a concurrency and memory management point of view. After that, approach the performance topic of Node servers, and how its internals can affect it. Node under the hood Terminology Overview of Node’s concurrency model Overview of Node’s memory model Diagram and clarifications The callback queues The heap Bindings and threads Notes on performance
